description:
The best Chinese English Dictionary app is now on iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch. It covers over 170,000 words and phrases of the contemporary Chinese language (Both Traditional and Simplified Chinese), along with example sentences, audio pronunciations, fastest search speed, flexible search methods, and more … 

REVIEWS

- "Chinese English Dictionary definitely ranks in the top five most useful education iOS app, which gives you much help when learning Chinese and English." - Best10Apps.com

- “Very helpful, easy to navigate and understand.” - Daniel Loughlin

- “Has most of the words and combinations commonly used!” - Kaartlan

- “I tested many Chinese apps, but this is one of the best apps so far. “ – Twwww~

- “Contains every word I need, along with pronounciations and phrases.” – Precreator


FEATURES

- Over 170K Chinese words & phrases 
- Example sentences
- Audio pronunciation
- Spelling suggestions 
- Search history record
- Fastest search engine
- Flexible search by English, Chinese Handwriting & Mandarin Chinese’s Pinyin
- Share learning progress via social networks
- Optimized for iPad, iPhone and iPod touch

If you require any assistance, please contact us at cs@bravolol.com. Remember that we can solve most of the problems, but we cannot respond to comments. Thank you for your support.
trackCensoredName: Chinese English Dictionary Free 英中字典
trackName: Chinese English Dictionary Free 英中字典
releaseNotes:
- iOS compatibility update
- Adds support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+
